attributes.action: Give the whole UK the opportunity to vote on any future Scottish referendum.
attributes.background:
In September 2014 Scotland voted on whether it wanted to remain in the UK or become independent.
First Minister Nicola Sturgeon is now calling for a second referendum, and as the result would affect the whole of the UK I believe the whole UK should be allowed to vote, not just citizens of scotland.

rejection.details: The open petition similar to yours is here: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/129508
